title: Women's 1500 m - Speed Skating Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 1500 m 1972","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":null,"37":null,"38":"Women's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Women's 1500 m competition was held at the Makomanai Speed Skating Rink and 31 athletes participated in the event.","39":null,"40":"These results for Women's 1500 m - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","41":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 1500 m 1972","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Dianne Holum","6":"Christine Baas-Kaiser","7":"Atje Keulen-Deelstra","8":"Elisabeth van den Brom","9":"Rosemarie Taupadel","10":"Nina Statkevich","11":"Connie Carpenter","12":"Sigrid Sundby","13":"Kapitolina Sereguina","14":"Monika Pflug","15":"Satomi Koike","16":"Kim Bok-soon","17":"Han Pil-hwa","18":"Lyudmila Savrulina","19":"Paula Dufter","20":"Tuula Vilkas","21":"Emiko Taguchi","22":"Kaname Ide","23":"Lisbeth Berg","24":"Sylvia Filipsson","25":"Sylvia Burka","26":"Choi Jung-hee","27":"Kirsti Biermann","28":"Leah Poulos","29":"Ylva Hedlund","30":"Ann-Sofie J\u00e4rnstr\u00f6m","31":"Gayle Gordon","32":"Chun Sun-ok","33":"Kim Myung-Ja","34":"Jennifer Jackson","35":"Monika St\u00fctzle","36":null,"37":null,"38":"Women's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Sapporo 1972 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
